parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions Mircea Geoană and encourages voters to support the Partidul România în Acțiune Mehedinți.  This directly refers to a candidate and a political party participating in the elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and uses hashtags suggesting a broad reach, indicating it addresses the wide population. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The clear call to action ("vote Partidul România în Acțiune Mehedinți") demonstrates an explicit intention to influence the vote in favor of a specific party. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c. The objective is clearly electoral.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It's not presenting objective information or analysis but rather promoting a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, a clear act of political campaigning.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>7967423503360752</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 7967423503360752, is a paid advertisement explicitly promoting Mircea Geoană and the Partidul România în Acțiune Mehedinți.  The post's call to action directly encourages voters to support this specific party.  The targeting parameters (age, location) further suggest an attempt to influence the outcome of the parliamentary elections. While the post doesn't explicitly mention the parliamentary elections, the context (political category, timing, and call to action) strongly implies its purpose is to sway voters during the election period.  The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Mircea Geoană</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PRA</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Partidul România în Acțiune, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 7967423503360752) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care îndeamnă la votarea lui Mircea Geoană și a Partidului România în Acțiune Mehedinți, având un efect electoral clar prin îndemnul direct la vot.  Postarea, deși nu menționează explicit alegerile parlamentare, îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGEA nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, prin referirea directă la un candidat (Mircea Geoană), adresarea către publicul larg și obiectivul electoral evident.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
